mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zjc_goods WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id}

SELECT
FROM zjc_goods WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id}

SELECT
FROM zjc_goods

select sum(case when is_on_sale='1' and goods_state_1 = '3' and goods_state_2 = '3' then 1 else 0 end) as is_on_sale, sum(case when store_count='0' and goods_state_1 = '3' and goods_state_2 = '3' then 1 else 0 end) as store_count, sum(case when is_on_sale='0' and is_gb = '0' then 1 else 0 end) as cat_id, sum(case when is_hot='1' then 1 else 0 end) as is_hot from zjc_goods where store_id=#{store_id} ORDER BY goods_id DESC

SELECT
FROM zjc_goods
ORDER BY goods_id DESC

SELECT t3.goods_name,t2.goods_num as goods_num from zjc_users_info t LEFT JOIN zjc_order t1 on t.user_id=t1.user_id LEFT JOIN zjc_order_goods t2 on t1.order_id=t2.order_id LEFT JOIN zjc_goods t3 on t3.goods_id=t2.goods_id where t.user_id=#{user_id} and t3.goods_sn =#{goods_sn} and t.xpt='xpt' and t1.pay_status = 1

SELECT t.original_img,t.goods_name,t.goods_id,t.market_price ,t.shop_price,t.store_count,t.sales_sum,t.is_vip ,t1.limit_cost_price as limit_cost_price,t1.limit_market_price as limit_market_price ,t1.end_time as end_time,t1.start_time as start_time,t.is_mixed,t2.store_id as store_id,t2.store_name as store_name from zjc_goods t INNER JOIN zjc_prompt_goods t1 on t.goods_id=t1.goods_id LEFT JOIN zjc_store t2 on t.store_id=t2.store_id where t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t2.store_state = 3 and t.prompt_goods = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start_time},'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end_time},'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') ORDER BY goods_id DESC

SELECT
FRoM zjc_goods
ORDER BY goods_id DESC

SELECT t.goods_id, t.goods_sn, t.goods_name, t.store_count, t.comment_count, t.market_price, t.shop_price, t.original_img, t.sort,t.is_recommend, t.is_new, t.is_hot, t.sales_sum, t.goods_state_2, t.approval_id,t.is_mixed,t.is_voucher,t.cat_id,t.cat_id2, t.on_time FROM zjc_goods t inner join zjc_store t1 on t.store_id=t1.store_id LEFT JOIN zjc_goods_sorting t2 on t2.goods_id=t.goods_id
t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t1.store_state = 3 and t.prompt_goods = 0
AND t.is_hot = #{hot}
AND t.special_offer = #{special_offer}
AND t.commodity_categories=3
AND t.commodity_categories=1
AND t.commodity_categories=2
ORDER BY t.sort asc,t2.goods_num DESC

SELECT t.goods_id, t.goods_sn, t.goods_name, t.store_count, t.comment_count, t.market_price, t.shop_price, t.original_img, t.sort,t.is_recommend, t.is_new, t.is_hot, t.sales_sum, t.goods_state_2, t.approval_id,t.is_mixed,t.is_voucher,t.cat_id,t.cat_id2, t.on_time FROM zjc_goods t left join zjc_store t1 on t.store_id=t1.store_id
t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t1.store_state = 3
AND t.is_hot = #{is_hot}
AND t.special_offer = #{special_offer}
AND t.commodity_categories=3
AND t.commodity_categories=1
AND t.commodity_categories=2
ORDER BY t.sales_sum DESC

SELECT
FROM zjc_goods
ORDER BY goods_id DESC

SELECT
FRoM zjc_goods
ORDER BY goods_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) AS aos_rows_ FROM zjc_goods

mapper.select:
SELECT t.goods_id, t.goods_sn, t.goods_name, t.store_count, t.comment_count, t.market_price, t.shop_price, t.original_img, t.sort,t.is_recommend, t.is_new, t.is_hot, t.sales_sum, t.goods_state_2, t.approval_id,t.is_mixed,t.is_voucher,t.cat_id,t.cat_id2 FROM zjc_goods t left join zjc_store t1 on t.store_id=t1.store_id
t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t1.store_state = 3 and t.prompt_goods = 0 and t.shop_price=0 and t.market_price != 0
AND (t.goods_name like concat('%', #{goods_name}, '%') OR t.keywords like concat('%', #{goods_name}, '%'))
order by t.sort,t.on_time DESC

SELECT * from zjc_goods t where t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t.shop_price=0 and t.market_price != 0 and t.goods_sn in ("TP002565452", "TP002565495", "TP002562877", "TP002562878")

SELECT t.goods_id, t.goods_sn, t.goods_name, t.store_count, t.comment_count, t.market_price, t.shop_price, t.original_img, t.sort,t.is_recommend, t.is_new, t.is_hot, t.sales_sum, t.goods_state_2, t.approval_id,t.is_mixed,t.is_voucher,t.cat_id,t.cat_id2 FROM zjc_goods t left join zjc_store t1 on t.store_id=t1.store_id
t.is_on_sale=1 AND t.goods_state_1 = 3 and t.goods_state_2 = 3 and t.is_gb = 0 and t1.store_state = 3 and t.shop_price=0 and t.market_price != 0
AND (t.goods_name like concat('%', #{goods_name}, '%') OR t.goods_name like concat('%', #{goods_name}, '%'))
order by t.sort,t.on_time DESC

select t.goods_id,t.goods_name,t.store_count,t.comment_count,t.goods_content,t.market_price,t.shop_price, t.original_img,t.sales_sum,t.aduit_info,t.is_on_sale,t.is_mixed,t.spec_type,t1.store_id,t1.store_name, t1.store_logo,t1.area_info,t1.address_detail,t2.image_url,t.is_voucher,t3.start_time,t3.end_time,t.prompt_goods ,postage,expect_delivery,ts,remark,today_limit_times, today_limit_nums,contract_phone,is_free_shipping,t.shop_group_price ,t.shop_group_market_price,t.drops from zjc_goods t left join zjc_store t1 on t.store_id = t1.store_id left join zjc_goods_images t2 on t.goods_id=t2.goods_id left join zjc_prompt_goods t3 on t.goods_id=t3.goods_id where 1=1
AND t.goods_id = #{goods_id}

select t1.goods_name, t1.goods_id, t2.name as cat_name, t1.market_price, t1.shop_price, t1.cost_price, t1.sales_sum, t1.store_count, t1.is_on_sale from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id
(t1.cat_id = #{cat_id} or t1.cat_id2 = #{cat_id})
and t1.brand_id = #{brand_id}
and t1.keywords =%${keywords}%'=
and t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_gb = 1
order by t1.goods_id desc
select from zjc_goods where goods_id = #{goods_id}
select id as value , name as display from zjc_goods_category where parent_id = 0
mapper.update: update zjc_goods set is_on_sale = 0 where goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.select:
select from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id
(t1.cat_id = #{cat_id} or t1.cat_id2 = #{cat_id})
and t1.brand_id = #{brand_id}
and (t1.keywords like '%${keywords}%' or t1.goods_name like '%${keywords}%')
and t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_on_sale = 1 and t1.goods_state_1 = 3 and t1.goods_state_2 = 3
order by t1.last_update desc

select from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id
(t1.cat_id = #{cat_id} or t1.cat_id2 = #{cat_id})
and t1.brand_id = #{brand_id}
and (t1.keywords like '%${keywords}%' or t1.goods_name like '%${keywords}%')
and store_id = #{store_id} and goods_state_2 in (1, 2) and is_on_sale = 1
order by t1.last_update desc
mapper.sql: t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t1.goods_id, t2.name as cat_name, t1.market_price, t1.shop_price, t1.cost_price, t1.sales_sum, t1.store_count, if(t1.is_mixed = 0 , '否', '是') as is_mixed, if(t1.goods_state_1 = 2 or t1.goods_state_2 = 2, '审核失败', '待审核') as goods_state_2
mapper.select:
select from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id
(t1.cat_id = #{cat_id} or t1.cat_id2 = #{cat_id})
and t1.brand_id = #{brand_id}
and (t1.keywords like '%${keywords}%' or t1.goods_name like '%${keywords}%')
and t1.store_id = #{store_id} and is_on_sale = 0
order by t1.last_update desc
mapper.update: update zjc_goods set is_on_sale = 0, last_update = now() where goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.select: select * from zjc_comment where comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.update: update zjc_goods set goods_state_1 = 1, goods_state_2 = 1, is_on_sale = 1, last_update = now() where goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.select:
select
from zjc_goods
is_new = 1 and is_on_sale = 1 AND goods_state_1 = 3 and goods_state_2 = 3 and is_gb = 0
order by goods_id desc

select
from zjc_goods
goods_state_1 = 3 and goods_state_2 = 3
select * from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_spec_goods_price t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id where t1.goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.update: update zjc_goods set store_count = #{store_count} where goods_id = #{goods_id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from zjc_goods where store_id = #{store_id} and is_on_sale = 1

select t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t2.name as cat_name, t1.shop_price, t1.market_price, t1.store_count, t1.sales_sum from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_on_sale = 1 and t1.goods_state_2 = 3

select t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t2.name as cat_name, t1.shop_price, t1.market_price, t1.store_count, t1.sales_sum from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.store_count <= 0

select t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t2.name as cat_name, t1.shop_price, t1.market_price, t1.store_count, t1.sales_sum from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_on_sale = 0

select t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t2.name as cat_name, t1.shop_price, t1.market_price, t1.store_count, t1.sales_sum from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_hot = 1
mapper.update: update zjc_goods set store_count = #{store_count} where goods_id = #{goods_id} and store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.select: select sum(case when (store_count = 0 and is_on_sale = 1 and goods_state_1 = 3 and goods_state_2 = 3) then 1 else 0 end) as qhNum, sum(case when (goods_state_2 in (1,2) and is_on_sale = 1) then 1 else 0 end) as dsNum, sum(case when is_on_sale = 1 and goods_state_1 = 3 and goods_state_2 = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as zsNum, sum(case when is_on_sale = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as xjNum from zjc_goods where store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.sql: t1.goods_name, t1.goods_sn, t1.goods_id, t2.name as cat_name, t1.market_price, t1.shop_price, t1.cost_price, t1.sales_sum, t1.store_count, t1.is_mixed, t1.original_img, if(t1.goods_state_1 = 2 or t1.goods_state_2 = 2, '审核失败', '待审核') as goods_state_2
mapper.select:
select from zjc_goods t1 left join zjc_goods_category t2 on t1.cat_id = t2.id
where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.store_count = 0 and t1.is_on_sale = 1 and t1.goods_state_1 = 3 and t1.goods_state_2 = 3
where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.goods_state_2 in (1,2) and t1.is_on_sale = 1
where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_on_sale = 1 and t1.goods_state_1 = 3 and t1.goods_state_2 = 3
where t1.store_id = #{store_id} and t1.is_on_sale = 0
AND t1.goods_name like '%${goods_name}%'
order by t1.last_update desc
